name: Sacrifice (itch) (Rizky Nur Hidayatullah)
description:
Devs Note:
- Wait 1 - 5 minutes for download game resource
- Check the Help menu for control information About this game

Sacrifice is a platformer game that can be played on browsers. This game tells about a boy who is adventurous to find objects that can cure all diseases. The adventure passes through seven different worlds. In every world, the boy must collect gems by defeating every guardian of the world.

Features
  • 7 different areas, bosses, and monsters
  • Various player skills
  • Item and shop
  • Upgradable passive skill
  • Book of lore
  • Catchy music and good visual display
  • Save game progress through the browser
"If you like this game feel free to support us"
